verses.text: Out \w of|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* depths \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* cried \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H4994"\w* Lord:

Lord, hear \w my|strong="H3808"\w* voice. \w Let|strong="H3808"\w* thy ears \w be|strong="H3808"\w* attentive \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* supplication.
If thou, O Lord, wilt mark iniquities: Lord, who shall stand \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* thee \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* merciful forgiveness: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* reason \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy law, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* waited \w for|strong="H3068"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*. \w My|strong="H3068"\w* soul hath relied \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* word:
\w My|strong="H3605"\w* soul hath hoped \w in|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord.
\w From|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* morning watch even until night, \w let|strong="H1961"\w* Israel hope \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* Lord.
Because \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* Lord there \w is|strong="H3709"\w* mercy: \w and|strong="H3709"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w him|strong="H4390"\w* plentiful redemption.
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* redeem Israel \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H1288"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* iniquities.
